00006 import modules.taskModule.actions.GenerateSourceCode;
00007 import modules.taskModule.actions.ViewModuleSource;
00008 import newtonERP.common.ActionLink;
00009 import newtonERP.common.ListModule;
00010 import newtonERP.module.AbstractOrmEntity;
00011 import newtonERP.module.Module;
00012 import newtonERP.orm.associations.PluralAccessor;
00013 import newtonERP.orm.field.Field;
00014 import newtonERP.orm.field.Fields;
00015 import newtonERP.orm.field.type.FieldInt;
00016 import newtonERP.orm.field.type.FieldString;
00017 import newtonERP.viewers.viewerData.ListViewerData;
00018 
00023 public class ModuleEntity extends AbstractOrmEntity
00024 {
00027         public ModuleEntity()
00028         {
00029                 super();
00030                 setVisibleName("Module");
00031         }
00032 
00033         protected Fields preInitFields()
00034         {
00035                 // always build the field from initField and not from DB, thats mean
00036                 // that we cannot add a dynamic Field, this should not be done anywhere
00037                 // else
00038                 return initFields();
00039         }
00040 
00041         @Override
00042         public Fields initFields()
00043         {
00044                 FieldString visibleName = new FieldString("Nom visible", "visibleName");
00045                 visibleName.setNaturalKey(true);
00046 
00047                 Vector<Field<?>> fieldList = new Vector<Field<?>>();
00048                 fieldList.add(new FieldInt("Numéro", getPrimaryKeyName()));
00049                 fieldList.add(new FieldString("Nom système", "systemName"));
00050                 fieldList.add(visibleName);
00051                 return new Fields(fieldList);
00052         }
00053 
00057         public Module getModule()
00058         {
00059                 return ListModule.getModule(getModuleName());
00060         }
00061 
00062         private String getModuleName()
00063         {
00064                 return getDataString("systemName");
00065         }
00066 
00067         @Override
00068         public ListViewerData getList(Hashtable<String, String> parameters)
00069 
00070         {
00071                 parameters.put(getPrimaryKeyName(), "&");
00072 
00073                 ListViewerData entityList = super.getList(parameters);
00074                 entityList.addSpecificActionButtonList(new ActionLink("Voir source",
00075                                 new ViewModuleSource(), parameters));
00076 
00077                 entityList.addSpecificActionButtonList(new ActionLink("Générer source",
00078                                 new GenerateSourceCode(), parameters));
00079 
00080                 return entityList;
00081         }
00082 
00086         public Vector<EntityEntity> getEntityEntityList()
00087         {
00088                 PluralAccessor accessor = getPluralAccessor(new EntityEntity()
00089                                 .getSystemName());
00090                 Vector<EntityEntity> entityEntityList = new Vector<EntityEntity>();
00091                 for (AbstractOrmEntity entity : accessor)
00092                         entityEntityList.add((EntityEntity) entity);
00093                 return entityEntityList;
00094         }
00095 
00099         public Vector<ActionEntity> getActionEntityList()
00100         {
00101                 PluralAccessor accessor = getPluralAccessor(new ActionEntity()
00102                                 .getSystemName());
00103                 Vector<ActionEntity> actionEntityList = new Vector<ActionEntity>();
00104                 for (AbstractOrmEntity entity : accessor)
00105                         actionEntityList.add((ActionEntity) entity);
00106                 return actionEntityList;
00107         }
00108 }
